Class ContinuousIntegrationServer

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.AbstractLifeCycle
org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.ContainerLifeCycle
org.eclipse.jetty.server.handler.AbstractHandler
ContinuousIntegrationServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jetty.server.Handler, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Container, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Destroyable, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Dumpable, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.Dumpable.DumpableContainer, org.eclipse.jetty.util.component.LifeCycle
public class ContinuousIntegrationServer extends org.eclipse.jetty.server.handler.AbstractHandler
The continuous intergration server. When a webhook is activated it clones the repository, compiles it and sends the result to the author who pushed the code.

    • cloneRepository

      public static void cloneRepository(String url) throws IOException, org.eclipse.jgit.api.errors.GitAPIException
      This function clones down the given github repo to a temporary folder located where JVM was started.
      Parameters:
      url - String link to the github repo that is to be cloned.
      Throws:
      IOException
      org.eclipse.jgit.api.errors.GitAPIException

    • sendMail

      public boolean sendMail(String to, String build) throws IOException, IllegalArgumentException
      This function notifies the author about the build result via email. The email is sent to the one linked with the authors github account.
      Parameters:
      to - String path to were the pom-file for the maven project exists.
      build - String path to were the pom-file for the maven project exists.
      Returns:
      Return a boolean. True if the email was successfully sent and false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException
      IllegalArgumentException

    • compileRepository

      public static int compileRepository() throws org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.MavenInvocationException
      This function creates an instance of the ProjectBuilder class and compiles the code.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean result from projectBuilder.Compilemaven which reports the results of the compilation.
      Throws:
      org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.MavenInvocationException
